name: io.github.VictoriaMetrics-Community/mcp-victoriametrics
description: MCP Server for VictoriaMetrics. Provides integration with VictoriaMetrics API and documentation

environmentVariables.name: VM_INSTANCE_ENTRYPOINT
environmentVariables.description: URL to VictoriaMetrics instance (it should be root URL of vmsingle or vmselect), for example http://localhost:8428 or https://play.victoriametrics.com

environmentVariables.name: VMC_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Optional: API key from VictoriaMetrics Cloud Console (if you have deployment in VictoriaMetrics Cloud)

environmentVariables.name: MCP_DISABLED_TOOLS
environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated list of tools to disable

environmentVariables.name: MCP_DISABLE_RESOURCES
environmentVariables.description: Disable all resources (documentation tool will continue to work)
